headline: Morgan Stanley Hikes Lam Research (LRCX) PT to $158, Keeps Equal Weight on Increased 2027 Wafer Fab Equipment Forecast
summary: Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) is one of the most profitable tech stocks to buy. On December 2, Morgan Stanley analyst Shane Brett raised the firm’s price target on Lam Research to $158 from $137 with an Equal Weight rating on the shares. This decision comes as the firm has largely maintained its 2026 Wafer Fab […]
